name: 皿 - Dish - Teller - Тарелка, a Dadaist poem by Takahashi Shinkichi (Anniversary limited edition)
description: By Takahashi Shinkichi (1921) and @Merzmensch (2010-2021). This limited edition consists of 22 plates (as many plates as in Takahashi's first publishing 1923: 「ダダイスト新吉の詩」) . Read more: https://medium.com/cryptomerz/%E7%9A%BF-dish-teller-%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%B0-d660a4e91e43
